product_name: FCS Adjustable Stand Up Paddleboard Comp Leash
long_description: Designed for flatwater and suited for speed, the Adjustable Stand Up Paddleboard Comp Leash reduces drag in the water thanks to its coiled design and 7mm cord. Ideal for boards fitted with a plug at the front of the board, the Adjustable Stand Up Paddleboard Comp Leash is recommended for boards measuring 12 ft. 6 in. to 14 ft. Rail-saver strap reduces abrasion by using a rip-and-stick tab and cord loop. Machined, stainless-steel swivels enhance freedom of motion and durability.
short_description: Designed for flatwater and suited for speed, the Adjustable Stand Up Paddleboard Comp Leash reduces drag in the water thanks to its coiled design and 7mm cord.
